name: Line Filler
description:
A simple puzzle game, where your goal is to fill the shape with lines of given length. The problem is - the 5th element of every line expands on the sides! See if you can solve all the levels!

Controls:

LMB - place a tile

RMB - remove a tile

I still wasn't able to fit all the features i wanted. But for 3 hours, i'm pretty proud of what I made!
